item.title: IterResearch: Rethinking Long-Horizon Agents with Interaction Scaling
item.description:
Overview
#

SWALM Agent is our flagship project — an intelligent agent framework designed to autonomously solve complex software engineering tasks. Built on a modular architecture, it supports multiple agent paradigms and integrates seamlessly with containerized environments.

Key Features
#

  • Multiple Agent Architectures: Supports CodeAct, SWE-Agent, Cline, ReAct, and custom agent implementations
  • Rich Tool Ecosystem: File operations, shell execution, Jupyter notebooks, web browsing, and search capabilities
  • Container-Based Execution: Secure sandboxed environments via Portal service for safe code execution
  • Comprehensive Benchmarking: Built-in support for SWE-Bench, Terminal-Bench, math reasoning, and competitive programming tasks
  • Flexible LLM Integration: Compatible with OpenAI, Azure, and various LLM providers

Architecture
#

The system follows a modular monorepo structure:
